original: Öhrn, Eber Vilihellm;, apotekare, Fal-köpimg, f. 7/7/95 i Jönköp. av Vilhelm Ö. o. Josefina Bergbom. G. 21 m. Ro’sa Linnéa Sjöstrand. Barn: Åke f. 27. — Stud:ex. i Vänersb. 14, farm, kand. 17, apot:ex. 21. Elev v. apot. i Vänersb. 14-16, anst. i Skövde o. Alingsås 21-3’7, förest, åtta mån., priv. à apot. i Delsbo 37, transp. t. apot. Svalan i Falköp. 43’. Styr :led. i Gävle -Dala krets av Sv. apot:förb. 40, full-m:’suppl. s. å., fullm. 41. En av stift, av Sv. kristl. farmifören. o. dess sekr. Kommifullm. i Delsbo 38. Led. av nyk-terh :nd i Falköp. sed. 45.
translated: Öhrn, Eber Vilihellm;, pharmacist, Fal-köpimg, b. 7/7/95 in Jönköping. Son of Vilhelm Ö. and Josefina Bergbom. Married to Ro'sa Linnéa Sjöstrand in 1921. Children: Åke, b. 1927. Education: high school graduation in Vänersborg 1914, bachelor's degree in pharmacy 1917, pharmacist exam in 1921. Apprentice at a pharmacy in Vänersborg 1914-1916, employed in Skövde and Alingsås 1921-1937, manager for eight months, private pharmacy in Delsbo 1937, transferred to the Svalan pharmacy in Falköping in 1943. Board member of the Gävle-Dala district of the Swedish Pharmacy Association in 1940, full member in the same year, and full-member representative in 1941. Secretary of the Swedish Christian Pharmacy Association. Deputy commissioner in Delsbo 1938. Member of the temperance board in Falköping since 1945.
